quote: It didn’t take much to turn a man solitary-being the new guy too often, being controversial now and then, a couple of unsuccessful attempts at a lasting relationship with a woman…
quote_letters: IT DIDNT TAKE MUCH TO TURN A MAN SOLITARY-BEING THE NEW GUY TOO OFTEN BEING CONTROVERSIAL NOW AND THEN A COUPLE OF UNSUCCESSFUL ATTEMPTS AT A LASTING RELATIONSHIP WITH A WOMAN
